Description: Fragment from the throne of a black granite statue of Thutmose I; inscribed with the prenomen and epithets.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr Harry Reginald Holland Hall
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Votive offerings to Hathor (Oxford 1993), p.7.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1990 / Who were the Pharaohs? A History of their Names with a List of Cartouches (p12)
